detectors.description:
UniswapRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#671-687) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#677)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#680)
detectors.markdown:
[UniswapRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#L671-L687) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#L677)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#L680)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in UniswapRewards.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#646-649):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#647)
		- uniswapLP.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#575)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#517)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#517)
		- qub.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#655)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#600)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- periodFinish = block.timestamp.add(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#665)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#599)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- rewardRate = initreward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#664)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#654)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#602)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#648)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniswapRewards__7.sol#603)
